thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Sharon

author: Sharon
title: Sharon
text: I've been a customer of Thriftbooks.com for over a year now and I'm so glad I found them. They have reasonable rates plus free shipping. On most occasions they will upgrade the books that they can without me having to ask them. I love this perk. I think they are very thoughtful of me and our environment. They always deliver on time and it's not a long wait. I highly recommend Thriftbooks.com to anyone and everyone who loves to read.
